name: Elementary School (Grades 1-4)
description: Elementary school students are introduced to the fundamentals of active learning and accountability. Curriculum focuses on language development in German and in English and building mathematical competencies. Also supported is the social-emotional development of each individual child as well as fostering their creativity.

howToGetIt: 1. Submit Online Inquiry 2. Attend a tour, or sign up for Open House or Open Classrooms. 3. Submit application together with the application fee of $75 4. Please submit the Parent Interview Form and the Student Evaluation Form / Recommendation to be filled out by the previous preschool or daycare (if applicable) 5. An online parent interview may be required by the Kibili Division Head - you will be informed and provided with an interview date 6. A decision is communicated to parents by the end of February 7. A spot will be awarded: please, accept and continue 8. Sign contract and submit annual fees 9. Complete all Health- and other required forms listed To ensure your child can begin on the first day of school, please submit your signed enrollment agreement by June 30. All remaining enrollment documents must be finalized by July 31.
cost: This is a fee based service with financial aid available.
